trans-unit.source: Supplies a hash code for an object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um código hash para um objeto, usando um algoritmo de hash que diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas de cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider implements the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings, just as <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings.
trans-unit.target: CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>interface dando suporte a comparações de maiusculas e minúsculas em cadeias de caracteres, assim como <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface com suporte a comparações de maiusculas e minúsculas em cadeias de caracteres.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> </xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: The objects used as keys by a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> are required to override the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface) and the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface).
trans-unit.target: Os objetos usados como chaves por um <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>são necessárias para substituir o <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método (ou o <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>interface) e o <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método (ou o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface).</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of both methods or interfaces must handle case sensitivity the same way; otherwise, the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> might behave incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de métodos ou interfaces deve lidar com diferenciação de maiusculas e minúsculas do mesmo modo; Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>podem se comportar de forma incorreta.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: For example, when creating a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, you must use this class with the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> class or any case-insensitive <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, ao criar um <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, você deve usar essa classe com o <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>classe ou qualquer maiusculas de minúsculas <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>implementação.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> class using the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> classe usando o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> instance is created using this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>instância for criada usando este construtor o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>do thread atual é salva.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the casing rules; therefore, hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Procedimentos de comparação usam a cultura salva para determinar as regras de maiusculas e minúsculas; Portanto, as comparações de código hash podem ter resultados diferentes dependendo da cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as comparações de específicos de cultura, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>namespace e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> classe usando especificado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the casing rules.
trans-unit.target: Procedimentos de comparação usam especificado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>para determinar as regras de maiusculas e minúsculas.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Comparações de código hash podem ter resultados diferentes dependendo da cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as comparações de específicos de cultura, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>namespace e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to use for the new <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> a ser usado para o novo <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: culture is .
trans-unit.target: cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> que está associado a <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> do thread atual e que está sempre disponível.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> instance is created using the parameterless constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>instância é criada usando o construtor sem parâmetros, o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>do thread atual é salva.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the casing rules; therefore, hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Procedimentos de comparação usam a cultura salva para determinar as regras de maiusculas e minúsculas; Portanto, as comparações de código hash podem ter resultados diferentes dependendo da cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as comparações de específicos de cultura, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>namespace e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> que está associado a <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> associado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> e que está sempre disponível.

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the casing rules.
trans-unit.target: Usam os procedimentos de comparação de <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para determinar as regras de maiusculas e minúsculas.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Comparações de código hash podem ter resultados diferentes dependendo da cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as comparações de específicos de cultura, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>namespace e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> associado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the given object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um código hash para o objeto fornecido, usando um algoritmo de hash que diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas de cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The return value from this method must not be persisted for two reasons.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno deste método não deve ser mantido por dois motivos.

trans-unit.source: First, the hash function of a class might be altered to generate a better distribution, thereby rendering any values from the old hash function useless.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro, a função de hash de uma classe pode ser alterada para gerar uma distribuição melhor, tornando quaisquer valores da função de hash antigo inútil.

trans-unit.source: Second, the default implementation of this class does not guarantee that the same value will be returned by different instances.
trans-unit.target: Em segundo lugar, a implementação padrão dessa classe não garante que o mesmo valor será retornado por instâncias diferentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> for which a hash code is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para o qual um código hash a ser retornado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the given object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para o objeto fornecido, usando um algoritmo de hash que diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas de cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: obj is .
trans-unit.target: objis .
